nodes.text: Green Squadron, also known as Green Team, was a Resistance starfighter squadron. Following the evacuation of the Resistance base on D'Qar, Green Squadron was stationed aboard the MC85 Star Cruiser Raddus, and was preparing to launch when Kylo Ren's personal squadron destroyed the cruiser's main hangar. In the aftermath of the Battle of Crait, a Green Team was assigned a mission that involved infiltrating a First Order Star Destroyer. A few weeks later, Green Leader contacted Vi Moradi to warn her about an approaching incursion against her outpost on Batuu.
On at least one occasion, a Green Squadron RZ-2 A-wing interceptor fought alongside a group of MG-100 StarFortress SF-17 bombers in combat.
